tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE learners (
  learner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  age INT,
  registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE assessments (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  learner_id INT REFERENCES learners(learner_id),
  assessment_date DATE,
  score FLOAT,
  feedback TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE questions (
  question_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_id INT REFERENCES assessments(assessment_id),
  question_text TEXT,
  correct_answer TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AdultLearners (
    learner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_name VARCHAR(50),
    email_address VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Quizzes (
    quiz_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    quiz_name VARCHAR(100),
    quiz_description TEXT,
    quiz_time_limit INT
)

CREATE TABLE Questions (
    question_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    question_text TEXT,
    correct_answer VARCHAR(100),
    quiz_id INT REFERENCES Quizzes(quiz_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_id INT REFERENCES AdultLearners(learner_id),
    quiz_id INT REFERENCES Quizzes(quiz_id),
    marks_obtained INT
)

CREATE TABLE Responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    learner_id INT REFERENCES AdultLearners(learner_id),
    question_id INT REFERENCES Questions(question_id),
    selected_answer VARCHAR(100)
)
